turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Chuck, I'd like you to hop online and order me a latte at Starbucks. Can you make a stop there on your way back?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, Dr. Ryan. Ah, which one do you you want me to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at the Russell Invest for me to grab it on my way out. Let me see...at 1301 2nd Avenue, Suite 200, Seattle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me see...at 1301 2nd Avenue, Suite 200, Seattle. Huh, only three blocks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. I can pick it up before I head into the light rail station.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what are we getting today? You want your usual mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I really need to cut down the calories. Let's go with a standard Cafe Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. What size would you like? Short, tall, grande, or venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A tall will be just fine. Ordered a venti last week and regretted it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Alright, single or double espresso shot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Single, single. It's four o'clock, I don't need to be THAT awake.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Understood. Ah, what type of milk with this one? They have almond, coconut, nonfat, whole, two percent, and soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with the almond. I've been into that one lately.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hey, I thought you were trying to cut down that carbon footprint? Just giving you a hard time. Any other flavor for you? Honey, caramel...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, let's keep it plain. I still have the holidays to walk off here. And Chuck? You wanna see a carbon footprint, walk over here and I'll plant one in your backside.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ha ha. Maybe another time. Okay, I've got a tall single plain latte with almond milk, no flavoring. Sure you don't want a cookie?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chuck, you're incredibly unhelpful but well-intentioned. Alright, order that thing. Just use the expense account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: As you command. Your caffeine awaits you for pickup at the Russell Investments Starbucks, 1301 2nd Avenue. Your receipt will be texted to you as usual.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much, good sir. Hey one last thing...is that page still open? Can you tell me the calorie count on my thing?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, that 150 calories, and a third of that is from fat.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You just had to add that last little detail, didn't you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's what you pay me for.
